title: 04/12/2021 - Hour 2
itunes:title: 04/12/2021 - Hour 2
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb talk about the Browns possible union with DE Jadaveon Clowney, the quarterbacks at the top of the 2021 NFL Draft and which teams need them, what the Los Angeles Lakers big win over the Brooklyn Nets means (if anything), and the Phillies get a controversial win over the Braves.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
